Replying to @batiste_dek 2018-10-21 11:53
@batiste_dek @Netlify Yes. This is where Environment Variables are your friend. You can add environment variables via the admin interface and then access them in your code with process.env.YOUR_ENV_VAR_NAME And dotenv can help with local dev and keeping them out of your repo. https://t.co/OxI1GsuZTz https://t.co/57W1whIfSx
